description: Try our easy to follow Pan-Cooked Lasagne recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lasagne,Soy free,Tree nut free,Mince,Sesame free,Beef,Peanut free
name: Pan-Cooked Lasagne Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Add the onion, carrot and celery and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until soft. Add the mince and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon to break up, for 5 minutes or until browned. Stir in tomato paste, passata and 1 cup water. Increase heat until boiling, then reduce heat to medium and simmer for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, cut the lasagne sheets into 3cm-wide strips and add to pan separately so they donâ€™t stick together. Stir until combined. Cook for 15 minutes or until pasta is tender. Season.

Stir milk, ricotta and parmesan together in a bowl. Sprinkle half of the mozzarella over mixture in pan. Dollop ricotta mixture over sauce. Top with remaining mozzarella. Cook for 2 minutes or until cheese melts. Serve sprinkled with basil.
